attributes.action: Stop charging vehicle tax at a monthly rate. It should be charged daily.
attributes.additional_details: The great vehicle tax rip off .. along with insurance tax means anyone using a vehicle legally gets stung enough WITHOUT the Chancellors underhand robbery. I don't want to pay for the days I don't use my vehicles, I can only use one at once and the current system rips me off if I change one mid month.
attributes.background: Vehicle duty (road tax) is currently an unfair tax ripping off the British motorist. Charging monthly means if someone buys or sells a vehicle mid month the Government benefits by getting 2 lots of tax for that month from the buyer AND seller (if the new owner uses it immediately). Charge daily.
